mapper.select: SELECT A.ID , (SELECT CODE_NM FROM common_code B WHERE A.REGION_CD = B.CODE_VAL) AS REGION_NM , (SELECT CODE_NM FROM common_code B WHERE A.AREA_CD = B.CODE_VAL) AS AREA_NM , A.ROOM_NM , A.THEME_NM , (SELECT CODE_NM FROM common_code B WHERE A.GENRE_CD = B.CODE_VAL) AS GENRE_NM , A.CONTENT , A.MIN_PARTY , A.MAX_PARTY , A.RUN_TIME , A.ACTIVITY , A.DEVICE_RATIO , A.PRICE , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_likes WHERE THEME_ID = A.ID) AS LIKES , A.RATING , A.LEVEL , A.IMG_PATH , A.CREATED_ID , A.CREATED_TIME , A.UPDATED_ID , A.UPDATED_TIME , A.NEW_THEME FROM ESCAPE_ROOM_LIST A WHERE A.NEW_THEME = 'Y' ORDER BY CREATED_TIME DESC, RATING DESC

SELECT A.ID , (SELECT CODE_NM FROM common_code B WHERE A.REGION_CD = B.CODE_VAL) AS REGION_NM , (SELECT CODE_NM FROM common_code B WHERE A.AREA_CD = B.CODE_VAL) AS AREA_NM , A.ROOM_NM , A.THEME_NM , (SELECT CODE_NM FROM common_code B WHERE A.GENRE_CD = B.CODE_VAL) AS GENRE_NM , A.CONTENT , A.MIN_PARTY , A.MAX_PARTY , A.RUN_TIME , A.ACTIVITY , A.DEVICE_RATIO , A.PRICE , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_likes WHERE THEME_ID = A.ID) AS LIKES , A.RATING , A.LEVEL , A.IMG_PATH , A.NEW_THEME , A.RCMD , A.CREATED_ID , A.CREATED_TIME , A.UPDATED_ID , A.UPDATED_TIME FROM ESCAPE_ROOM_LIST A WHERE A.RCMD = 'Y' ORDER BY RATING DESC
